info.description: The API for Project Koku and OpenShift cost management. You can find out more about Project Koku at [https://github.com/project-koku/](https://github.com/project-koku/).
info.title: Cost Management

schema.description: Dictionary key is the start of a billing month.  Value is report processing statistics.

requestBody.description: Application settings that needs to stored

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Cost Management

CostType.name: cost-type
CostType.description: String to indicate cost type in report

QueryComputeCount.name: compute_count
QueryComputeCount.description: Toggle to include count values in report.

QueryDelta.name: delta
QueryDelta.description: Toggle to include delta values in report.

QueryEndDate.name: end_date
QueryEndDate.description: String to indicate end date of date range.

QueryFilter.name: filter
QueryFilter.description: The filter to apply to the report as a URL encoded dictionary.

OCPTagsFilter.name: cluster
OCPTagsFilter.description: The cluster_id or cluster_alias to filter on

QueryGroupBy.name: group_by
QueryGroupBy.description: The grouping to apply to the report as a URL encoded dictionary.

QueryOrderBy.name: order_by
QueryOrderBy.description: The ordering to apply to the report as a URL encoded dictionary.

QueryOffset.name: offset
QueryOffset.description: Parameter for selecting the offset of data.

QueryLimit.name: limit
QueryLimit.description: Parameter for selecting the amount of data in a returned.

ReportQueryLimit.name: limit
ReportQueryLimit.description: Parameter for selecting the amount of data in a returned. Limit of 0 will return all data.

ReportQueryUnits.name: units
ReportQueryUnits.description: The units used to report data.

QueryKeyOnly.name: key_only
QueryKeyOnly.description: Flag to indicate whether or not only the tag key values will be returned.

QueryStartDate.name: start_date
QueryStartDate.description: String to indicate start date of date range.

QueryType.name: type
QueryType.description: String to identify user access permission type (i.e. AWS, cost_model).

QueryValue.name: value
QueryValue.description: Parameter for matching the value data using a contains.

QueryOrder.name: ordering
QueryOrder.description: Parameter for ordering the value data.

basic_auth.description: The userid/password is needed when accessing this API externally

example.detail: {'sources': ['RabbitMQ unavailable. Unable to update Source ID 1.']}

date.description: Future date for this forecast Y-value.
Future date for this forecast Y-value.

sub_orgs.description: the list of sub orgs under the org

accounts.description: the list of accounts under the org

provider_linked.description: Flag to indicate if provider is linked to source.

active.description: Flag to indicate if provider is successfully configured.

paused.description: Flag to indicate if provider is paused.

current_month_data.description: Flag to indicate if provider has report data for the current month.

previous_month_data.description: Flag to indicate if provider has report data for the previous month.

has_data.description: Flag to indicate if provider has report data for any month.

infrastructure.description: Dictionary containing OpenShift foundational infrastructure type and uuid.

cost_models.description: List of cost model name and UUIDs associated with this source.

limit.description: Limits the data points returns and aggregates remaining data.

offset.description: Offsets the data points returned when using limit.

limit.description: Limits the data points returns and aggregates remaining data.

offset.description: Offsets the data points returned when using limit.

offset.description: Offsets the data points returned when using limit.

offset.description: Offsets the data points returned when using limit.

limit.description: Limits the data points returns and aggregates remaining data.

offset.description: Offsets the data points returned when using limit.

ReportGrouping.description: The grouping to apply to the report. No grouping by default. When grouping by account the account_alias will be provided if avaiable.

ReportAzureGrouping.description: The grouping to apply to the report. No grouping by default. When grouping by account the account_alias will be provided if avaiable.

ReportOpenShiftGrouping.description: The grouping to apply to the report. No grouping by default.

ReportOpenShiftAWSGrouping.description: The grouping to apply to the report. No grouping by default. When grouping by account the account_alias will be provided if avaiable.

ReportOpenShiftAzureGrouping.description: The grouping to apply to the report. No grouping by default. When grouping by account the account_alias will be provided if avaiable.

ReportOrdering.description: The ordering to apply to the report. Default is ascending order for the data.

ReportAzureOrdering.description: The ordering to apply to the report. Default is ascending order for the data.

ReportInventoryOpenShiftOrdering.description: The ordering to apply to the report. Default is ascending order for the data.

ReportCostsOpenShiftOrdering.description: The ordering to apply to the report. Default is ascending order for the data.

ReportOpenShiftAWSOrdering.description: The ordering to apply to the report. Default is ascending order for the data.

ReportOpenShiftAzureOrdering.description: The ordering to apply to the report. Default is ascending order for the data.

ReportDelta.description: Field to calculate delta values for in report.

ReportResolution.description: The resolution to apply to the report. Default resolution is daily.

ReportTimeScopeUnits.description: The units to apply to the report. Default time_scope_units is day.

ReportTimeScopeValue.description: The time scope to apply to the report. Default time scope is '-10', meaning the last 10 days. Last 30 days would be '-30'. '-10' and '-30' are only valid when used with 'day' time_scope_units.'-1' is used for current month, '-2' is used for last month when time_scope_units is 'month' otherwise invalid.

ReportResourceScope.description: The resources scope to apply to the report. Default resource scope is null, meaning no product or service filtering.

units.description: The units for the output data.

cluster.description: The cluster_id or cluster_alias to filter on
